Example 7

1+q2(1−q)+q6(1−q)(1−q2)+⋯=∏j=0∞1(1−q5j+2)(1−q5j+3),for ∣q∣<1. 1 + \frac{q^2}{(1-q)}+\frac{q^6}{(1-q)(1-q^2)}+\cdots = \prod_{j=0}^{\infty}\frac{1}{(1-q^{5j+2})(1-q^{5j+3})}, \quad\quad \text{for }\lvert q\rvert<1. 1+(1−q)q2​+(1−q)(1−q2)q6​+⋯=∏j=0∞​(1−q5j+2)(1−q5j+3)1​,for ∣q∣<1.
